SEARCH
Package Hotel

Class Controller_Console

java.lang.Object
Hotel.Controller_Console
public class Controller_Console extends Object
The Controller class acts as the intermediary between the Model and View in the Model-View-Controller (MVC) design pattern. It handles user input and interacts with the model and view to perform the necessary operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller_Console

      public Controller_Console()

  • Method Details

    • repeatPromptHotelName

      public Hotel repeatPromptHotelName()
      Repeatedly prompts the user for a hotel name until they provide a valid one or quit.
      Returns:
      null if the user quit midway; the hotel instance, otherwise

    • repeatPromptHotelBasePrice

      public double repeatPromptHotelBasePrice()
      Repeatedly prompts the user for a base price per night until they provide a valid one or quit.
      Returns:
      0 if the user quit midway; the base price per night, otherwise

    • createHotel

      public void createHotel()
      Creates a new hotel with a unique name and a base price for its rooms. Prompts the user for input and handles the creation process.

    • repeatPromptHotelInfo

      public char repeatPromptHotelInfo()
      Repeatedly prompts the user for a number from 1-3 corresponding to the hotel information they want to view
      Returns:
      '0' if the user quit midway; a char from 1-3, otherwise

    • repeatPromptDayOfMonth

      public int repeatPromptDayOfMonth()
      Repeatedly prompts the user for a day in the system month.
      Returns:
      an integer from 1-31; 0 if the user quit midway

    • repeatPromptRoomName

      public String repeatPromptRoomName(String hotelName)
      Repeatedly prompts the user for a valid room name.
      Returns:
      the room name; "" if the user quits midway

    • repeatPromptReservationCheckInDay

      public int repeatPromptReservationCheckInDay()
      Repeatedly prompts the user for a valid check-in day.
      Returns:
      the check in day; 0 if the user quits midway

    • viewLowLevelInfo

      public void viewLowLevelInfo(Hotel hotel)
      Displays detailed information about a specified hotel, including room and reservation details. Prompts the user for input and handles the information viewing process.
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel for which to display information

    • viewHotel

      public void viewHotel()
      Allows the user to view high-level or low-level information about a selected hotel. Prompts the user for input and handles the information viewing process.

    • manageHotel

      public void manageHotel()

    • bookReservation

      public void bookReservation()
      Manages the process of booking a reservation. Prompts the user for hotel selection and valid check-in and check-out dates. Retrieves the total available rooms by date for the selected hotel.

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the main program loop. Displays the main action prompt and handles user input for various actions: creating a hotel, viewing a hotel, managing a hotel, booking a reservation, and quitting the program. Continues running until the user decides to quit.
